channel.title: Make NPC's have GFXs
channel.description: Hi, I would like to give NPCs GFXs like player GFXs. :D There was a tut for this somewhere, but I can't seem to find it. :( Btw, I'm talking about adding the update mask for it and all that stuff, not StillGFXs, those are useless. :rolleyes:

item.title: Make NPC's have GFXs
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Hi, I would like to give NPCs GFXs like player GFXs. There was a tut for this somewhere, but I can’t seem to find it. Btw, I’m talking about adding the update mask for it and all that stuff, not StillGFXs, those are useless. :rolleyes:
